FuncDef: This command configures the rate for ICMP host and network destination unreachable messages issued on the router interface.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of ICMP unreachable messages to send. This parameter must be specified with the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 2000.
The time frame in seconds used to limit the number of ICMP unreachable messages that can be issued. Values-1 to 60.
